item.title: Pilatus PC-12 X-Plane Wallpaper
item.description:
I was asked to share this wallpaper – well, here you go. You can download the image in full resolution here: Thranda PC-12 Wallpaper (2560Ã—1440)

Installation for X-Plane 12 is easy: just place the .png file into the Output/backgrounds/ folder of your X-Plane installation.
